deletebatch-help:
Delete a batch of pages.
You can either perform a single delete, or delete pages listed in a file.
Choose a user that will be shown in deletion logs.
Uploaded files should contain page name and optional reason, separated by a '|'.
action-deletebatch-spoof: batch delete pages as 'Delete page script'
right-deletebatch-spoof: Batch delete pages as 'Delete page script'
